com.munger.passwordkeeper.view

Class SelectFileFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.munger.passwordkeeper.view.SelectFileFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class SelectFileFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This fragment allows the user to select a file from the saved files directory and have the activity load it up

      • deleteFile

        private void deleteFile(java.lang.String name)
        Delete the file permanently if confirmed. Bring up a prompt to ask the user if they really want to delete the selected file.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file to be deleted.
